name: Create LionDesk contacts and Evernote notes from Custom Webhooks
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically create a new note on Evernote and validate if the email output from the webhook is valid using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will look the person up using Clearbi, create a new contact on LionDesk, and send a Slack message. If the person already exists in LionDesk it will send a Slack message.
